trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Plainfield
There were no other sightings in Plainfield on or around April 2nd 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking for ufos (as usual in my backyard), it was about 10:00 p.m. I looked 46 degress west and a bright white object with a strick about 30 to 60 ft long.at first i thought it was a shooting star.its actions were staight west no moving around just straight. it looked liked it was about to crash. after it disappeared 4 to 7 seconds later i heard sirens go off ,and they where going for about 5 min. after that i wrote every thing that happened that past 10 mins in my note book. the ufo encounter was a ce 1 i flet nothing i didnt do any thing i just stood there i lost sight of it when it went behind the trees. after that i wrote it all down in my note book. the sighting was a ce 1, and thats my story.
